zone: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh City District
circumstances: En route, the crew contacted ground and obtained the permission to divert to Saigon-Tan Son Nhat for an emergency landing after an in-flight. After landing, the airplane came to rest in flames and was destroyed while both pilots escaped uninjured. The cause of the fire was probably a sabotage but this was not proven.
probable_cause: In-flight fire in the cargo compartment for undetermined reason.
